fasttravel.title: Broken Bridge
fasttravel.descr: This bridge was destroyed by retreating Temerian troops during the Nilfgaardian attack. It was shoddily built to begin with. Good riddance

fasttravel.title: Abandoned Village
fasttravel.descr: A few years ago, a group of armed men marched into this settlement. They butchered its inhabitants and burned down their homes. Not a soul has dwelt here since that black and bloody day

fasttravel.title: Ford
fasttravel.descr: Before the war, merchants and travelers would cross the river here. Now only Nilfgaardian soldiers traverse this path

fasttravel.title: Ransacked Village
fasttravel.descr: A band of soldiers attacked this village early one morning. They slaughtered most of the villagers in their beds, and the lucky few who fled to the woods in time had nothing left to return to

fasttravel.title: Cackler Bridge
fasttravel.descr: Bridge named in honor of a woman who went mad from unfulfilled love. After her heart snapped, she spent all her days running up and down this bridge while laughing hysterically

fasttravel.title: Mill
fasttravel.descr: Carts haul grain from all the surrounding villages to White Orchard's mill

fasttravel.title: Nilfgaardian Garrison
fasttravel.descr: This strategic point guards White Orchard's main river crossing. Nilfgaardian troops have taken it over

fasttravel.title: Sawmill
fasttravel.descr: White Orchard is famous not only for its premium fruit, but also for the top-quality, furniture-grade lumber harvested from the Vulpine Woods

fasttravel.title: Woesong Bridge
fasttravel.descr: So named because of a girl who once would stand on the bridge and sing, waiting for her beloved's return

fasttravel.title: Crossroads
fasttravel.descr: The road splits here. One fork leads to Vizima, the other to Novigrad

gwent.descr: Gamble your hard earned coin playing Gwent here. Warning, this player may disappear later in the game.

merchant.descr: Sells Gwent cards, crafting supplies, and Temerian: blinders, saddle, saddlebags, armour

pointofinterest.title: Crystal Skull
pointofinterest.descr: From the Intro Video, unlocks a dialog with Yennifer at her 'The Last Wish' Quest. Can only be picked up if you haven't left White Orchard yet

pointofinterest.title: Lootable Battlefield
pointofinterest.descr: This battlefield can be looted for easy early game coin

pointofinterest.title: Serpentine silver sword
pointofinterest.descr: Viper School Diagram (2/2), below the chapel

tavern.descr: Sells Gwent cards, food, and drink. Disappears after progressing through story quests.
